title: Sales Development Representative (B2B Cold Caller)
job_overview:
Sales Development Representative (B2B Cold Calling)

Are you looking for a company that values your voice, supports your growth, and offers long-term stability?

You’ve come to the right job posting. We’re looking for a confident and persuasive Sales Development Representative to join our team. If you’re an experienced B2B cold caller who enjoys connecting with decision-makers and opening doors, this role could be a great fit.

What You’ll Do:

- Call design firms, procurement teams & developers to introduce our products.
- Re-engage cold or non-responsive leads.
- Book meetings with our CEO.
- Keep CRM updated and organized.
- Help refine scripts and improve outreach.


What We’re Looking For:

- Confident, warm communicator with B2B cold calling experience.
- Professional, persuasive, and skilled at handling objections.
- Organized and self-motivated with excellent follow-up skills.
- Able to work U.S. Pacific Time hours.
- Reliable home setup with good internet/audio quality.

To Apply:
Send your resume and sample video or audio recording to Upgrade to see actual info excited to meet someone who’s looking for long-term stability and wants to grow with us!
